description:
Sweet strawberries and lightly roasted peanuts blended with creamy nut butter, hearty oats and crunchy rice crisps. Having solved the energy chew, Skratch Labs set their sights on creating an energy bar that tastes like a coffee shop cookie but delivers the fuel your body needs, and is easy to digest too.

  • Plant-based ingredients allow for fast absorption and easy digestion
  • 100% non-GMO ingredients
  • 50% less sugar than the average energy bar
  • Ingredients: nut butter blend (peanut butter, cashew butter [cashews, safflower or sunflower oil]), roasted peanuts, tapioca syrup solids, tapioca syrup, dried strawberries, coconut nectar, oats, quinoa crisps, brown rice crisps, vegetable glycerine, strawberry powder, oat flour, sorghum flakes, sea salt, tapioca soluble fibre, sunflower lecithin
  • Allergens: peanuts, tree nuts (cashews, coconut)
name: Skratch Labs Energy Bar Peanut Butter and Strawberries
